name: SLIPE
description:
- How to play - Drag the Cube in any direction and let him SMASH against the BORDERS to get to a higher PLATFORM! - News - I will keep SLIPE up to date with updates and try to implement your wishes into the game. - Early Access - SLIPE is still in developement, so bugs may still exist. 

(If you should find one, feel free to write it in the comments!)

- Future Updates - ShopAudio Spectrum

And more...

- Socials - Coming soon - What are you waiting for? -
